FFr_EA4474CC.Text.Text:
In this quest, the player/writer sets out to find a mythical narrative bible known as the Ehhh Aye*. Whoever wields the tome can use simple verbal prompts to generate narrative content guaranteed to make their game score 100% on Metacritic! 

Quest Outline: https://www.notion.so/chadbriggs/External-Lore-Page-Example-3c459c4d0ac842c99885f9059000c925?pvs=4



*See what I did there? Don't worry, there is a lot more where that came from! Hang on to yer knickers!

DFr_15767B0E.Text.Text:
The safe is open! You've discovered:

-A last will and testament with markup and notes scrawled on it.
